title: Oh My MCP!
description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) users discovering the power of AI tool integration
description_zh: MCP (模型上下文协议) 用户发现 AI 工具集成的强大力量

images.caption: When you realize what MCP can do
images.caption_zh: 当你意识到 MCP 能做什么的时候

context.scenario: When developers discover they can give Claude access to their entire development environment
context.scenario_zh: 当开发者发现可以让 Claude 访问他们的整个开发环境时

author: Deepractice Community
